001package imagingbook.lib.math.testing;
002
003import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
004import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
005
006import imagingbook.lib.math.MahalanobisDistance;
007import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
008import imagingbook.lib.math.VectorNorm;
009
010public class MahalanobisTest1 {
011
012        public static void main(String[] args) {
013                /*
014                 * Test example from Burger/Burge 3rd edition (Appendix D):
015                 * N = 4 samples, K = 3 dimensions
016                 */
017
018                double[] X1 = {75, 37, 12};
019                double[] X2 = {41, 27, 20};
020                double[] X3 = {93, 81, 11};
021                double[] X4 = {12, 48, 52};
022
023                System.out.println("X1 = " + Matrix.toString(X1));
024                System.out.println("X2 = " + Matrix.toString(X2));
025                System.out.println("X3 = " + Matrix.toString(X3));
026                System.out.println("X4 = " + Matrix.toString(X4));
027                System.out.println();
028
029                double[][] samples = {X1, X2, X3, X4};
030
031                MahalanobisDistance mhd = new MahalanobisDistance(samples);
032
033                double[] mu = mhd.getMeanVector();
034                System.out.println("mu = " + Matrix.toString(mu));
035                System.out.println();
036
037                // covariance matrix cov (3x3)
038                double[][] cov = mhd.getCovarianceMatrix();
039                System.out.println("cov = \n" + Matrix.toString(cov));
040                System.out.println();
041
042                double[][] icov =  mhd.getInverseCovarianceMatrix();
043                System.out.println("icov = \n" + Matrix.toString(icov)); 
044                System.out.println();
045
046                System.out.format("MH-dist(X1,X1) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X1, X1));
047                System.out.format("MH-dist(X1,X2) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X1, X2));
048                System.out.format("MH-dist(X2,X1) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X2, X1));
049                System.out.format("MH-dist(X1,X3) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X1, X3));
050                System.out.format("MH-dist(X1,X4) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X1, X4));
051                System.out.println();
052
053                System.out.format("MH-dist(X1,mu) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X1, mu));
054                System.out.format("MH-dist(X1)    = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X1));
055                System.out.format("MH-dist(X2,mu) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X2, mu));
056                System.out.format("MH-dist(X2)    = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X2));
057                System.out.format("MH-dist(X3,mu) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X3, mu));
058                System.out.format("MH-dist(X3)    = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X3));
059                System.out.format("MH-dist(X4,mu) = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X4, mu));
060                System.out.format("MH-dist(X4)    = %.3f\n", mhd.distance(X4));
061                System.out.println();
062
063                VectorNorm L2 = new VectorNorm.L2();
064                System.out.format("L2-distance(X1,X2) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(X1, X2));
065                System.out.format("L2-distance(X2,X1) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(X2, X1));
066
067                // ------------------------------------------------------
068
069                System.out.println();
070                System.out.println("Testing pre-transformed Mahalanobis distances:");
071                RealMatrix U = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(mhd.getWhiteningTransformation());
072                System.out.println("whitening transformation U = \n" + Matrix.toString(U.getData()));
073
074                double[] Y1 = U.operate(X1);
075                double[] Y2 = U.operate(X2);
076                double[] Y3 = U.operate(X3);
077                double[] Y4 = U.operate(X4);
078                double[] muT = U.operate(mu);
079
080                System.out.println("Y1 = " + Matrix.toString(Y1));
081                System.out.println("Y2 = " + Matrix.toString(Y2));
082                System.out.println("Y3 = " + Matrix.toString(Y3));
083                System.out.println("Y4 = " + Matrix.toString(Y4));
084
085                System.out.println();
086                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y1,Y2) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y1, Y2));
087                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y1,Y3) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y1, Y3));
088                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y1,Y4) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y1, Y4));
089                
090                System.out.println();
091                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y1,muT) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y1, muT));
092                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y2,muT) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y2, muT));
093                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y3,muT) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y3, muT));
094                System.out.format("whitened L2-distance(Y4,muT) = %.3f\n", L2.distance(Y4, muT));
095        }
096}
097
098/*
099X1 = {75.000, 37.000, 12.000}
100X2 = {41.000, 27.000, 20.000}
101X3 = {93.000, 81.000, 11.000}
